column5: Hi everyone!  Been a lurker for a long time and decided to join in today. A new member of OFAH and a lover of our great Ontario outdoors. Just got into fishing in the last couple of years and want to LEARN everything I can.  A great day is time in the canoe trying to figure out where the fish are hiding and what they want!  Looking forward to continue learning from you guys and gals.  I live and work in Toronto.  I've seen a few threads, so headed out before work this morning and hooked into this baby!  Not a soul out there. Did the "politically correct" thing and blurred the shot.  Jogger took the pic. Nice lady too.  Cheers,  Gans
You're not allowed to have two accounts Bubba
Amen Roy!  Nor should he be fishin' today.  Newbies!
Welcome!  Great shot, I wish I was there.
Dude, relax. I hope you're joking. Lots of fish still there   Thanks,  I'm heading down again at lunch with a few of my buddies. Will post a follow-up report, hopefully!
I like the obscured background, you will fit in well here.
Dang.. them on/off line lights are flashing like a CN rail crossing....
Oops!  I'll terminate one soon.  Wish me luck!
love the name, especially when read backwards
Todays winner might be a draw,  1. Lundboy 2. Lookinforwalleye
Darn, I don't know enough people here...  good one.

WE HAVE A WINNER!!  LUNDBOY YOU HAVE NOW BEEN CROWNED THE:  APRIL FOOL   Thanks for being a good sport and thanks to Roy for letting this transpire!    From your Perrrrenial idiot,  gans 1 lirpa ( APRIL 1 SNAG)
I guess I now I can't say "I never win anything"
